lyrics:
"Dope Boys" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Dope Boys" All Nas need is one mic, all I need is one stove Homie got a nice flow but gucci got that white coke You ain't getting the right dope, you knocking on the wrong door Last nigga tried me, let's just call him John Doe And since you short a dime homie then park me a old school I fronted you, you ran off that's not what you're supposed to do I'm gettin my tip fade cut Bouldercrest and Flat Shoals Wish a nigga would run up on me like I'm Brisco Yeah, Gucci mane's a live wire Try me like I'm Yung Berg and I'mma make yo eyes cry Gucci like to drank, and Gucci like to smoke And Gucci on the rise while you niggas going broke GUCCI! (Gucci Mane's a G') Tell me something I don't know I got court in early morning I don't really wanna go I do this for the people cause I'm my brother's keeper I don't feel you cause I'm paraplegic, where's my paralegal See that house right there, yeah make a lot a money (Who's that knocking at the door?) Probably a couple junkies That coupe over there, yeah cost a couple hundreds See my neighborhood is bunkin tell my plug to keep it coming Dope boys, dope boys with the dope boss Dope boys, dope boys with the dope boss What you wanna get homie hurry up and buy it Dopeboys gone buy you gon' get yourself supply I'm in my M6 Beemer, this is no 645 Like a pigeon in the sky, I just shitted on your ride So much weight off in my house, you would think it was a gym Plus my Nikes match my necklace and my necklace match my rims I got court in early morning I don't really wanna go Say I violated probation just because I blew my nose Blew 300 on my Rolls 200 more on the Lamb Million dollars on the crib Car note, don't know what that is Gucci, you don't know who that is Mama that's just Gucci Mane, that's my boy that's my partner I'm Gucci Mane biggest fan Plus she don't know what that is I'm with that I don't give a damn If you think I give a fuck you must do not know who I am, Gucci See that house right there, yeah make a lot a money (Who's that knocking at the door?) Probably a couple junkies That coupe over there, yeah cost a couple hundreds See my neighborhood is bunkin tell my plug to keep it coming Dope boys, dope boys with the dope boss Dope boys, dope boys with the dope boss What you wanna get homie hurry up and buy it Dopeboys gone buy you gon' get yourself supply Mirror mirror mirror Who the realest in the game? (Why you ask that stupid question Boy you know that's Gucci Mane) East Atlanta 6 You know how we roll I just bought another Chevy got it right back out the bowl Tall stacks up in my closet I can't even see my clothes And my belly get so big I can hardly see my toes Got a car in my garage I have never ever drove It's a four-door black on black Phantom I call that bitch Dorrough If she going to the ladies room I guess I'll let her know I got powder in my living room, so she don't have to stroll A year ago today, I was sitting in my cell (Where you see yourself in 5 years?) A so icey billionare Gucci! See that house right there, yeah make a lot a money (Who's that knocking at the door?) Probably a couple junkies That coupe over there, yeah cost a couple hundreds See my neighborhood is bunkin tell my plug to keep it coming Dope boys, dope boys with the dope boss Dope boys, dope boys with the dope boss What you wanna get homie hurry up and buy it Dopeboys gone buy you gon' get yourself supply if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) { document.getElementById('azmxmbanner').style.display='block'; document.write('
'+ ''+ '
'); } Submit Corrections AZLyrics G Gucci Mane Lyrics mixtape: "The Burrprint (The Movie 3D)" (2009) Intro Dope Boys Frowney Face Watch Cost A Bentley Think I Want Her Gucci Speaks Yelp, I Got All Of That Trap Goin' Crazy My Shadow Excuse Me More Candy Lady Candy Lady (Remix) No No No My Chain Search
title: Dope Boys Lyrics | AZLyrics.com
